Text.p:
Now you can get Ponytas and Cubones as Shiny!
(I have updated the charts.)
Also, I'm not sure when it happened, but Shopping Boxes changed, so I have updated them.

For November there is a new set of Research Tasks centered on Bug types. (Catching 5 Bug-type Pokemon allows you to catch a Nincada!)
And, for the 7th day Research Breakthrough you can catch a Shedinja!
I have updated the Encounters Chart.
And, there are new shinies, including Pinsir and Caterpie.

Gengars will be Raid Bosses during a special event on Saturday 03 November, and they may be shiny too! It is assumed they will be a Tier 4 boss, and I am assuming Gastlies and Haunters may be shiny too.
I have temporarily moved Genger from a Tier 3 to a Tier 4 Raid Boss, and marked them as shiny.
UPDATE: Gengar Raid Bosses have the Move Set Lick, Psychic, and I have updated the Move Set Chart. (Psychic is pretty bad for a Gengar, but Lick is really good!)
First of all, more Gen 4 Pokemon are being released. I will update the charts as I find out about them.
Then, Mewtwo is no longer a Raid Boss, but the Gen 4 Pokemon Giratina will be replacing it.

And finally, there is a new Special Research Task A Spooky Message.
(I will be updating it as I find out what each step is.)
